#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int r,n1,n;



while(cin>>n)
{



    n1=n;

    while(n1>0)
    {
        r=n1%10;
        if(r!=0 && n%r!=0)
        {
            cout<<"Invalid\n";
            break;
        }
    n1=n1/10;
    }

if(n1==0)
cout<<"Valid\n";
}
return 0;
}
